questions.question: Select any one domestic animal kept for milk.

Why should children greet visitors at home?

questions.question: Select the Muganda agent used by the British to extend their rule to Eastern Uganda.

options: They formed political parties and rebellions agitating for independence

questions.question: Select one reason why plants in desert areas have deep roots
answer: To absorb nutrients from the ground
options: To absorb nutrients from the ground
To be firm in the ground

questions.question: Apart from cultivating crops and grazing animals, Select any other way the people of Uganda use land to earn a living

answer: It helps to produce crops throughout the year without depending on rain season
options: It helps to produce crops throughout the year without depending on rain season
It helps to reduce soil erosion
It helps to reduce soil depletion

answer: It leads to destruction of environment
It leads to pollution of the environment

It leads to pollution of the environment

questions.question: State any one way in which freedom of association is practised in Uganda today.
answer: People are allowed to attend church crusades and meetings
options: People are allowed to vote in uganda
People are allowed to attend church crusades and meetings

answer: It leads to scarcity of pasture and water

questions.question: Why are traffic police officers encouraged to wear jackets with reflectors while on duty?
options: Because its part of their uniform

questions.question: How does afforestation influence the climatic condition of a place?
answer: It helps to increase the rainfall amounts received in a place

It helps to increase the rainfall amounts received in a place

questions.question: How is Uganda different from Liberia in terms of colonization?
answer: Uganda was colonized by the Europeans while Liberia was not
options: Uganda was colonized by the British while Liberia was colonized by the Germans
Uganda was colonized by the Europeans while Liberia was not

questions.question: Select any one practice that shows that Uganda was at one time a British protectorate
answer: It uses english as an official language
options: It uses english as an official language

questions.question: Select any one reason why a country should maintain peace and security
What time is it at town X which is located 45<sup>o</sup> East if it's 6:00 am at Greenwich?
answer: It is 9:00 am at place X
options: It is 9:00 pm at place X
It is 9:00 am at place X

questions.question: How is Lake Victoria similar to Lake Kyoga in terms of formation?
answer: They were both formed by down warping
options: They were both formed by volcanicity
They were both formed by down warping

questions.question: What will the time be in a country at 60<sup>o</sup>E if it is 1:00 p.m at the Greenwich Mean Time?
answer: It will be 5:00 p.m at a place 60<sup>o</sup>E
options: It will be 5:00 p.m at a place 60<sup>o</sup>E
It will be 6:00 p.m at a place 60<sup>o</sup>E

questions.question: Why is mob justice a bad practice in communities
answer: It leads to violation of human rights
options: It leads to violation of human rights

questions.question: Select any one reason why the number of children dying of diseases has gone down in East Africa
answer: Due to the improvement in the provision of health services

Due to the improvement in the provision of health services
